title: Perform SAE Reconciliation
description: A data manager and a safety specialist must reconcile Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) between the clinical database and the safety database to ensure consistency.

tasks.description: Generate a listing of all SAEs from the clinical (EDC) database for a specific study.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts a report of SAEs from the clinical database.

tasks.description: Generate a listing of all SAEs from the safety database for the same study.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts a report of SAEs from the safety database.

tasks.description: Compare the two listings to identify any discrepancies in events or event details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compares the reports and finds a discrepancy: one event's severity is 'moderate' in clinical and 'severe' in safety.

tasks.description: Create a reconciliation log and assign the discrepancy to the appropriate party for resolution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the discrepancy and assigns a task to the data manager to clarify the correct severity with the site.
